abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (i)
            construction of water supply systems in about 70 rural
            communities and in the cities of Potosi and Sucre, including
            engineering and design studies; (ii) construction of
            sewerage facilities in Sucre; and (iii) technical assistance
            to strengthen the executing agencies and the Division of
            Urban Engineering in the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs.
